import{configureStore}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import topicsReducer from'../features/topics/topicsSlice';import quizzesReducer from'../features/quizzes/quizzesSlice';import cardsReducer from'../features/cards/cardsSlice';// import reducers
export default configureStore({reducer:{topics:topicsReducer,quizzes:quizzesReducer,cards:cardsReducer}});
